AMS

Advanced Manufacturing Scheduling is a powerful, web-based scheduling application that automates and optimizes your manufacturing plant’s schedule for increased efficiency and profit.

AMS Features

  • Web Based – No software to install. Easy to use. Access from anywhere with unlimited users per location.
  • Mobile Access – View your entire operation remotely from your phone! iOS and Android Apps available.
  • Cloud Enabled – Run on your own server or leverage the power of AWS or Azure.
  • AI Engine – Continuously optimize your manufacturing operation with the powerful rules-based decision engine.
  • Seamless Integration – works with your current ERP/MIS software to add significant benefits to your existing investments.

Product

Move up to the powerful AMS scheduling application for your operation.

  • Impress your customers with more on time deliveries and efficiency.
  • Instantly optimize your entire manufacturing operation with sub-second speed
  • AMS decision engine Use the powerful to deliver to your customers on time (or even early!).
  • Evaluate customer promise dates, workload, staff availability, tasks, equipment capabilities, tooling and material availability, and more.
  • Eliminate bottlenecks automatically.

Mobile Access

Remote access of real-time shop floor information.

Quickly view the status of your plant operations on the go. Includes barcode scanner functionality, and is usable on any device. Select your platform below to demo the mobile app. Use the sample barcodes to text the scanner feature.

Android iOS Windows Phone
Sample Order Barcode
Sample Cost Center Barcode

AI Decision Engine

Powerful machine intelligence that continuously optimizes your operation with blazing speed.

The AMS decision engine analyzes millions of variables and combinations to keep your plant running at optimal capacity. Analyze customer promise dates, workload, staff availability, tasks, equipment capabilities, tooling and material availability, and more.

Integrations

Easily integrates to your existing ERP/MIS system.

Seemlessly connects to your ERP/MIS system to automatically utilize your existing data. No new system or database required.

Try a Free Demo

Download the mobile app on your prefered platform below, or click to continue and log into the web app. Subscription pricing for the full AMS web scheduling application (site license) starting as low as $750 per month. Call today for more information.
